Params: {3: "Muddled consciousness drifts in the ocean's depths."}
{3: 'Waterlogged vision, waves crashing, whispers and howls in bubbles hitting your brain with every tide—'}
{3: 'Cold air fills your lungs, the taste of dust snapping you back to reality.'}
{3: 'Was it a nightmare, or a real glimpse of what happened?'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: "Are you the Commandant the Gray Raven team is desperately searching for? Or just one of the five they don't care about?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'I remember that Valeria gave me a whole pack... there were over a hundred candies in there. But I only recall eating two and giving you one.', 4: '1'}
{3: "And then there's that figure, blurry but familiar."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Who is she? Why does it feel like... she sees everything?'}
{3: 'And what did she mean, "it\'s not the right time"?'}
{3: 'After quickly writing down the key phrases and double-checking them, you look around.'}
{3: "By the bed, your boots are caked with ice and snow. To avoid getting sick and another lecture from Vanessa, you'll skip those for now."}
{3: 'This is a basic tent, nothing but the bed you were on. Through the entrance, faint light shines from the snowy outside.'}
{3: 'Before you blacked out, you were carrying Vanessa, heading to meet Emma and Discord, but judging by this...'}
{3: "Muffled voices drift in from outside. Before you can make out what they're saying, the tent flap opens."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Emma', 3: "Thank goodness, we were worried you'd never wake up...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She quickly checks the readings on your suit.'}
{2: 'Emma', 3: "Your suit was damaged, causing hypothermia and Punishing Virus infection. If you didn't have any serum left, you wouldn't have made it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Emma', 3: 'Your injuries were bad, so we moved to a safer spot and set up camp, trying to stabilize you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Emma', 3: 'Discord went back to Aerospace City for help, while I... stayed to watch you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Emma', 3: 'Discord will be back with a rescue vehicle soon...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Emma's acting weird, talking fast and making no sense while jamming the serum into your suit's port."}
{3: 'Hearing your call, she looks up, worried.'}
{2: "The serum port's on the right side.", 3: '109'}
{3: "Like a switch flipped, Emma's face goes pale, and her fingers start shaking."}
{3: 'She lowers her head, plugs the serum into the right port, and injects the whole dose. Then she stares at the infection readings.'}
{3: "Emma's lips are pressed together. Only when the readings start to drop does she look up, tears silently falling."}
{3: 'During the search, the orange-haired Construct spots someone moving through the snow.'}
{3: "Discord, who was searching elsewhere, hears Emma's call and looks toward her."}
{3: "The dark figures stumble before collapsing into the snow. Fortunately, they're close enough that Emma and Discord reach them with little effort."}
{3: "Two people are down in the snow. Vanessa's a mess, big wounds on her arm and leg, and the commandant..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Don't just stand there! The commandant has a damaged suit and is showing infection symptoms. Serum's in the kit—inject it now.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Seeing her rock, her support, in such a state throws Emma for a loop. Despite her panic, she follows Vanessa's orders, finding the serum and injecting it into the commandant's suit."}
{3: 'They grab a backup suit and quickly put it on the commandant. Then, they push through the wind and snow, heading fast for Aerospace City.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Cough... Where are the others you brought?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "After getting the commandant's message, we came right away. We sent the others to gather supplies nearby.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Tell them all to turn back and return to... Aerospace City.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Emma', 3: "Vanessa, stop talking. You're still losing a lot of vital fluid...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Emma pulls out a vital fluid pack and tries to hook it up to Vanessa, but Vanessa stops her.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Save it... We won't need it yet.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Emma, keep an eye on the Punishing Virus levels around us.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Agent Zero's already spotted the commandant. It won't let go of such easy prey. They are not likely to get everyone out of here alive."}
{3: 'She bites her lip, puts the vital fluid pack away, and turns on the virus monitor.'}
{3: "The blizzard's getting worse, howling and hitting everything."}
{3: 'Carrying an unconscious human and an injured Construct slows them down a lot.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Emma', 3: 'Discord, the Punishing Virus is spiking. How far to the rescue vehicle?', 4: '2'}
{3: "Emma glances at Vanessa, unsure if she's unconscious or simply resting with her eyes closed, then lowers her voice to ask Discord."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "From here... at our current pace, it'll take about two and a half hours.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Yeah, they didn't venture deep into the snowplain. The faster ones have probably already returned to the safe area around Aerospace City.", 4: '3'}
{3: 'During their conversation, the Mutated Red Tide has silently crept to their feet, unnoticed until now.'}
{3: 'Emma pulls Discord away, nimbly dodging the tide while carrying the commandant. She spins around and fires at the tentacles emerging from the thin crimson tide.'}
{3: "Though not as potent as the Omega Weapons in the past, Rosa's custom firearm proves more than sufficient against these small mutated tentacles."}
{3: 'The mutated tentacles recoil in pain, emitting a hoarse, mournful cry before retreating back into the puddle of liquid on the ground.'}
{3: 'However... it has already located them. How far could Agent Zero be now?'}
{3: 'In the shadows behind the rocks, the new Agent Zero stares in their direction with cold, lifeless eyes.'}
{3: 'It is newly born, knowing nothing except for the ceaseless urge to chase power, to endlessly consume, to devour this world whole.'}
{3: 'Everything in this world is supposed to serve as its nourishment.'}
{3: 'Its hollow eyes focus on the silhouettes in the distance.'}
{3: 'And that human... will become its most delectable feast.'}
{3: "Pushing her frame's output to maximum power, Emma anxiously glances behind her."}
{3: "They're still more than two hours away from where they parked the rescue vehicle. Emma isn't sure if she can safely bring Vanessa and the commandant back to Aerospace City..."}
{3: 'The sound of gunfire jolts Vanessa awake, pulling her back to reality.'}
{3: "The commandant has fallen unconscious. Without suppression, Vanessa's M.I.N.D.'s getting more unstable. She's using all her energy just to keep it together."}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'How far are we from Aerospace City?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Her words come out breathless, leaving it uncertain whether it's from her continued movement or from a profound sense of concern."}
{2: 'Emma', 3: 'But we could reach the rescue vehicle in two hours...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Even if you two pushed your systems to the limit... you still wouldn't make it.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The Red Tide's spreading fast, covering 40 to 50 kilometers a night."}
{3: 'Discord silently raises her weapon and fires, pushing back the Red Tide creeping toward them.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Those things... they're like parasites, sticking to you. Once they find you, they won't stop until they get a piece of you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vanessa seems to be thinking, but her eyes are unfocused.'}
{3: "As her M.I.N.D. is being hammered by waves of corruption, her body's screaming death from the cold."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Deploy... deploy Omega Weapons at the escape point, with plenty of explos...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She unconsciously gives the right orders for their situation.'}
{3: "Babylonia's Omega Weapons ran out a decade ago. They can't perfectly recreate them with what they have now."}
{3: 'She snaps back to reality with a bitter smile. Her vision blurs as her M.I.N.D. fades into darkness...'}
{3: 'A wave of deathly exhaustion washes over her. She bites down on her tongue, using the pain to force herself awake.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "It's no use. It's already locked on.", 4: '3'}
{3: 'Discord and Emma sprint forward, desperate to outrun Agent Zero\'s "gaze".'}
{3: 'But no matter where they go, the cold, creeping Red Tide follows like a shadow, impossible to shake off.'}
{3: "Weighted down by a heavy burden, it's just a matter of time before the Mutated Red Tide overtakes them."}
{3: "Spitting out the vital fluid that's filling her mouth again, Vanessa calmly assesses her frame's damage before speaking slowly."}
{3: "While running, Emma quickly checks the commandant's suit for infection."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Emma', 3: 'After the serum, infection levels are slightly high, but vitals are stable. Mild hypothermia too...', 4: '2'}
{3: "Her frame's about 70% damaged, her left arm gone, and her right leg wrecked and barely held on by bandages."}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "You two go on. Leave me here. I'll cover your escape.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She says it as casually as if she were saying, "I\'m going to find supplies".'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "At your current pace, we'll all be that thing's lunch in half an hour.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Not a bad way to go, actually. Rosa can watch us wave from inside the Red Tide back in Aerospace City.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Emma', 3: "No, absolutely not. We're not leaving you here alone...", 4: '2'}
{3: "Discord cuts in. Her breathing's erratic. For an older model like her, this pace is way past her limits—she's running on fumes."}
{3: 'With an annoyed wave, Vanessa fires her sidearm at a Hetero-Creature creeping up behind Emma—before Discord can react.'}
{3: "Emma jumps, nearly stepping into the Red Tide that's already seeping toward them."}
{3: "Without them noticing, the Red Tide's slowly closing in from all sides."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Agent Zero won't let its prey get away.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The snow field's still peaceful, but there's a deadly trap hidden beneath the snow."}
{3: 'She bites her lip, trying to find the best option.'}
{2: 'Emma', 3: 'For example, I could draw the Red Tide away while Discord gets you and the commandant out. I can still fight, after all...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "You're suggesting Discord carry both a cripple and an unconscious human, pushing her systems to the breaking point, and then keep that up for two hours?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Mid-sentence, Discord groans as she lifts her foot—the bottom of her shoe already stained with Red Tide.'}
{3: 'Covering her mouth and nose, Vanessa coughs, vital fluid leaking from the corner of her lips.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "We don't have time to argue. If we wait, we all die here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vanessa says, stating the damage to her frame.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Even if we got back to Aerospace City in time, they don't have enough to fix me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "I don't have the energy to convince you. Two choices.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'A, we all die. B, I stay behind to cover you.', 4: '1'}
{3: "As they speak, Mutated Red Tide tentacles silently reach out, wrapping around Emma's ankle."}
{3: 'Emma stumbles, and Vanessa cuts the rope, jumping off her back.'}
{3: 'Barely steady on her left leg, Vanessa tightens the bandage on her right leg with one hand. Vital fluid stains the ground.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: "I'll say this one last time. You and Discord take the commandant and leave. I'll cover your retreat.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Don't worry about how I'll do it, and don't worry about whether I can still fight.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'With her last bit of strength, Vanessa leans against a nearby rock.'}
{3: 'Snowflakes quickly cover her, turning red as they soak up her vital fluid.'}
{3: 'Without another word, Emma and Discord salute her and follow her orders, heading back to Aerospace City with the commandant.'}
{3: 'She looks up at the gray sky, forcing a bitter smile.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "The battlefield doesn't play nice. No one saves everyone, and everyone loses something—even you, Chief...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Using the ice as a mirror, she tries to smooth her messed-up hair and wipe the blood off her face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Guess one good thing about being a Construct is that synthetic skin cleans way easier than human skin.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her murmurs echo across the desolate icy ground, just as they did decades ago when she stayed in that dark underground chamber.'}
{3: 'Back then, she at least had the unconscious Chief for company, but now, she stands utterly alone in this vast, empty world.'}
{3: 'The Mutated Red Tide sloshes against the ice as Agent Zero slowly forms from the liquid.'}
{3: 'The purple-haired Construct gives Agent Zero a nasty smirk.'}
{3: "The tent is freezing cold. The entrance is frozen solid, and the wind's howling against the tent, making muffled thumps."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Emma', 3: "We heard the blast but didn't dare look back. We got to the safe zone first. After getting you settled, I went back to see.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Emma', 3: "The explosion... did something. The Mutated Red Tide's backed off for now, but the ice is gone. Just dark brown rock left.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'She opens her hand, showing a Scarab name tag, riddled with bullet holes and blackened by the blast.'}
{3: "You want to say something, but can't find the words. You open your mouth, but only a hoarse sigh comes out."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Let me re-introduce myself. My name is Vanessa, commandant of Egret and chief commander of this operation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Regardless of your past accolades, Commandant, you better follow my orders as the chief commander.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "【kuroname】, you stupid and naive piece of trash. You're only respected by so many people because they're lost in their own ideals.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Now you have no one to count on. Let me tell you how to maximize the value of survivors.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'This greeting comes 30 years late, Gray Raven Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'I thought this time you were finally dead for real.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Go on then. The sooner you leave, the sooner you'll be back.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "I'll wait right here. Don't worry—when you open your eyes, I'll be the first thing you see.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'All this time and still no news. If we follow the usual ▁▅▇▅▃▆▅▄▁ we would have already declared you dead.'}
{3: 'The voice seems to emerge from underwater waves, while the mini-terminal emits intermittent white noise.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Team Member', 3: 'The last dose is already gone...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The tent flap opens briefly as someone comes in, letting in a blast of cold wind that clears the air for a moment.'}
{3: 'Cold liquid flows into your vein as the blurry underwater scenery fades away once more. Emma looks at you with urgent concern.'}
{3: 'You force yourself to sit up, fighting against your exhaustion and ignoring the dizziness.'}
{3: 'A dark, deep sea follows you like a shadow, an inescapable cage weighing you down as it churns through your M.I.N.D.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Emma', 3: 'Your infection levels are spiking... Commandant, can you hold on?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Rosa's waiting for those core parts. You can't... let Vanessa's sacrifice be for nothing."}
{3: 'The team loads the supplies into the rescue vehicle while Discord and Emma wait by the car.'}
{3: 'This place... is really close to Aerospace City, less than half an hour away.'}
{3: 'Aerospace City\'s "filter" reaches this far, keeping Agent Zero out for now.'}
{3: 'You clutch the metal Scarab tag tightly, so much so that its sharp edges nearly pierce into your palm.'}
{3: "She must be so tired, carrying humanity's torch for thirty years. She did more than enough."}
{3: 'A torch with leaping red-gold flames suddenly lights up the area, held high like a relay baton.'}
{3: "As long as that fire burns... humanity's hope lives on."}
{3: "You won't let the civilization Vanessa saved fall apart."}
{3: 'The engine breaks the silence, and soon, heavy snow hides all their tracks.'}
{3: 'The pink-haired Construct stands on the mountaintop, watching the rescue vehicle disappear.'}
{3: "It's all deja vu, but... something feels different this time."}
{3: 'Red-gold flames seem to dance in her eyes. After a moment, old memories surface in her deep M.I.N.D.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'His name was Iel·2·Hithe, an immigrant from planet Bola. He had a lover who was... Pioneer 142.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Once... as the "heat death" approached, they seemed to have lived through a similar "story".'}
{3: 'Pages turn, but the memories are fading.'}
{3: 'Stars blinked out one by one as ships fled into deep space, never to return...'}
{3: "The story's always the same, but will these humans... share that fate?"}
{3: 'The dice collide with a crisp sound as the pink-haired Construct gazes at the departing rescue vehicle before vanishing into the snow-covered plain.'}
